meanings.sent1: The unburnt toast was still soft and pale.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter rescued the unburnt kitten from the building.
meanings.sent3: The unburnt marshmallow refused to turn golden brown over the campfire.
meanings.sent4: Her unburnt determination shone through despite the challenges she faced.
meanings.sent5: The unburnt wood emitted a fresh, earthy scent when placed in the fireplace.

meanings.sent1: The unburnt forest remained untouched by the wildfire.
meanings.sent2: The unburnt documents were safely stored in the fireproof cabinet.
meanings.sent3: The unburnt cookies were a pleasant surprise after the baking mishap.
meanings.sent4: His unburnt enthusiasm for the project was contagious among the team.
meanings.sent5: The unburnt fields stretched out endlessly under the clear blue sky.
